author: martin
msg: Vote - and note fix of proxy_util to accept and pass URL's in the format http://user:pass@host/

author: martin
msg: A request like http://user:10@host/path would be rejected by the
proxy_canon_netloc() routine if the caller (proxy_fixup in this case)
would not be interested in the username/password. In this case, the
url would be parsed incorrectly (the user:pass colon was misinterpreted
as the :port part of the host).
Now the parsing always allows for a user:pass@ part (but ignores it if
NOTE: all this crap should be cleaned up to use the parsed_uri values!
